name: John PETTY, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Petty v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation

parties: John PETTY, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th, day of December, 2009, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

986 A.2d 61
John PETTY, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
